Properties.ProtectedString:
-- Miiiinndd the drop! local Workspace = game.Workspace local Debris = game.Debris
local Radius = 10
local function waitForChild(parent, child) while parent:FindFirstChild(child) == nil do wait() end return parent[child] end
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = waitForChild(Tool, 'Handle') local Character = nil local PowerUp = waitForChild(Handle, "PowerUp") local PowerDown = waitForChild(Handle, "PowerDown") local UseSound = waitForChild(Handle, "Use")
local Lifting = waitForChild(Tool, 'Lifting') local otherParts = {} local liftingForces = {}
local function ParticlePart(PrimaryColor, SecondaryColor) local part = Instance.new('Part') part.Transparency = 0 part.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
local effect = Instance.new('Fire') effect.Color = PrimaryColor effect.SecondaryColor = SecondaryColor effect.Size = 3 effect.Parent = part
return part end
local function RecursiveModelMass(Model) local mass = 0 for _, v in pairs(Model:GetChildren()) do mass = mass + RecursiveModelMass(v) end if Model:IsA('Part') then mass = mass + Model:GetMass() end print(Model, mass) return mass end
function ThrowToPoint(location) Lifting.Value = false
for _, v in pairs(otherParts) do v.CanCollide = true game.Debris:AddItem(v, 1.5) v.Touched:connect(function(part) if not part then return end local character = part.Parent if not character then return end if character == Character then return end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if not humanoid then return end
humanoid:TakeDamage(2) -- Get hit!
end) end
for _, v in pairs(liftingForces) do if v.Parent and v.Parent.Name == 'Torso' then game.Debris:AddItem(v, 1.5) end v.position = location
end
end
function LiftArea(location) Lifting.Value = true -- Create the effect otherParts = {} for i = 1, 5 do otherParts[i] = ParticlePart(BrickColor.new(28).Color, Color3.new(70/255, 69/255, 19/255)) otherParts[i].Position = location + Vector3.new(math.cos(math.rad((i/5) * 360 + math.random(-180, 180))) * Radius, 2, math.sin(math.rad((i/5) * 360 + math.random(-180, 180))) * Radius) otherParts[i].CanCollide = false otherParts[i].Parent = Workspace
local target = otherParts[i].Position + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0) local force = Instance.new('BodyPosition') force.D = .9 + math.random(-.1, .1) force.P = 100 + math.random(-15, 15) force.maxForce = Vector3.new(500, 500, 500) force.position = target table.insert(liftingForces, force) force.Parent = otherParts[i]
local mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') mesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1290033' mesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1290030' mesh.Parent = otherParts[i]
end
-- Find any players unlucky enough to be near the hit local players = game.Players:GetPlayers() for _, v in pairs(players) do local character = v.Character if character and character ~= Tool.Parent then local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') if torso then if (torso.Position - location).magnitude <= Radius then character.Humanoid.Sit = true
local target = torso.Position + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0) local force = Instance.new('BodyPosition') force.D = .99 + math.random(-.1, .1) force.P = 196.2 + math.random(-15, 15) + RecursiveModelMass(character) * 500 force.maxForce = Vector3.new(5000, 10000, 5000) force.position = target table.insert(liftingForces, force)
force.Parent = torso end end end end
delay(4, function() if not Lifting.Value then return end
Lifting.Value = false
for _, v in pairs(liftingForces) do if v.Parent and v.Parent:IsA('Part') then v.Parent.CanCollide = true end v:Destroy() for _, p in pairs(otherParts) do game.Debris:AddItem(p, 1.5) end end
end)
end
function ShootTracer(target) local direction = (target - Handle.Position).unit
UseSound:Play()
local fireEffect = ParticlePart(Color3.new(85 / 255, 1, 1), Color3.new(170 / 255, 1, 1)) fireEffect.Position = Handle.Position + (direction * 4) fireEffect.Transparency = 1 local force = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') force.P = 1000 force.maxForce = Vector3.new(1000, 1000, 1000) force.velocity = direction * 100
force.Parent = fireEffect
fireEffect.Touched:connect(function(part) if Lifting.Value then ThrowToPoint(fireEffect.Position) else LiftArea(fireEffect.Position) end fireEffect:Destroy() end)
fireEffect.Parent = Workspace end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false
wait(2) Tool.Enabled = true end Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)
function onEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent PowerUp:Play() end Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
function onUnequipped() Character = nil PowerDown:Play() end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
function onMessageRecieved(message) if message:IsA("Vector3Value") and message.Name == "GloveTarget" then ShootTracer(message.Value) message:Destroy() end end Tool.ChildAdded:connect(onMessageRecieved)
